<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move the html for Rich Content from the rich_text field to rich_content_html</description>
        <name>Move Rich Content HTML</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[const contentGr = new GlideRecord('sn_cd_content_portal');
contentGr.setWorkflow(false);
contentGr.addQuery('content_type', '181d586d77741110a10440483f5a9933');
contentGr.addNullQuery('rich_content_html');
contentGr.addNotNullQuery('rich_text');
contentGr.query();
while (contentGr.next()) {
	contentGr.setValue('rich_content_html', contentGr.getValue('rich_text'));
	contentGr.setValue('rich_text', '');
	contentGr.update();
}]]></script>
